constituent: agreement, stop, footprint, moon, month, flesh, part of the body
heisigStory: Seeing footprints on someone's flesh indicates a rather brutal way of having secured that person's agreement.
hint: jack sparrow kicked in the back
koohiiStory1: A secret agreement between a covert gov´t agency and aliens states that we will not step foot on the moon again in return for alien technology.
koohiiStory2: NASA and Armstrong made an agreement: They´d never tell anyone that no-one actually stepped foot on the moon.
myStory: thoả thuận. thành phần đee giành thoả thuận dừng chiến
words: 肯定(こうてい): positive, affirmation
